$ g++ -std=c++11 -Wall -Wextra -O2 -o euler-11-largest-product-in-a-grid euler-11-largest-product-in-a-grid.cpp
$ ./euler-11-largest-product-in-a-grid grid.txt
Largest product of 4 adjacent numbers: 65430486
